minor_armor_enchantments.name: Adepts Armor
minor_armor_enchantments.description: Gain proficiency in a skill or double proficiency if already proficient.

minor_armor_enchantments.name: Armor Bond
minor_armor_enchantments.description: Summon or dismiss armor as a bonus action.

minor_armor_enchantments.name: Hardened Armor
minor_armor_enchantments.description: Critical hits become normal hits. Reduce forced movement by 10 feet.

minor_armor_enchantments.name: Icarus Armor
minor_armor_enchantments.description: Gain 60 ft flying speed for 10 minutes. Usable once per dawn.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Reactive Armor
major_armor_enchantments.description: +3 AC against subsequent attacks from a creature that hit you.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Damage Reduction
major_armor_enchantments.description: Reduce melee, ranged, or spell damage by the enchantment tier value. Doesn't stack with similar effects.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Glamoured Armor
major_armor_enchantments.description: Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks. Disguise armor appearance.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Invulnerability
major_armor_enchantments.description: Resistance to nonmagical damage. Once per long rest, immunity for 10 minutes.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Liars Armor
major_armor_enchantments.description: Advantage on Deception. Bonus action to deceive and gain attack advantage.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Sadist's Armor
major_armor_enchantments.description: Advantage on Intimidation. Frighten enemies within 30 feet. Reactions forced.

major_armor_enchantments.name: Versatile Armor
major_armor_enchantments.description: 3 charges to cast jump, longstrider, or enhance ability. Regains at dawn.

minor_shield_enchantments.name: Bashing
minor_shield_enchantments.description: Advantage on shove checks. Can shove as a bonus action and deal bludgeoning damage.

minor_shield_enchantments.name: Deflect Attacks
minor_shield_enchantments.description: Use reaction to gain resistance against an attack’s damage.

minor_shield_enchantments.name: Deflect Elements
minor_shield_enchantments.description: Use reaction to gain resistance to elemental damage type until end of next turn.

minor_shield_enchantments.name: Redirect Damage
minor_shield_enchantments.description: Use reaction to take damage instead of ally within 5 feet.

major_shield_enchantments.name: Spellguard
major_shield_enchantments.description: Spell attacks have disadvantage against you. Resistance to spell damage.

major_shield_enchantments.name: Shield Animation
major_shield_enchantments.description: Animate shield to float and protect you while freeing your hands.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Answering
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Use reaction to attack a creature that damaged you. Gain advantage on the attack roll.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Berserker
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Deals +2d6 extra damage when below half hit points.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Brutal Critical
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Roll an extra damage die on a critical hit. Can be applied multiple times.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Draw Vitality
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Spend a Hit Die on hit to heal. Regain all Hit Dice on long rest.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Improved Critical
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Crits on 19-20. Also crit if attack roll exceeds AC by 10.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Life Stealer
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Gain temporary HP based on tier when reducing a creature to 0 HP.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Returnin
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Weapon gains thrown property and returns to your hand.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Weapon Bond
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Returns after thrown. Recall from up to 1 mile.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Weapon Focus
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: Use spellcasting ability for weapon attack/damage rolls. Acts as a spellcasting focus.

minor_weapon_enchantments.name: Wounding
minor_weapon_enchantments.description: HP lost to this weapon can only be regained through rest.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Blinding
major_weapon_enchantments.description: On a crit, deal radiant damage and potentially blind the target.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Creature Slaying
major_weapon_enchantments.description: Extra 3d8 damage to a chosen creature type.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Dualist
major_weapon_enchantments.description: Add proficiency to AC when hit. If missed, make an opportunity attack.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Elemental Smite
major_weapon_enchantments.description: Spend spell slot to deal 1d8/level elemental damage.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Magical Power
major_weapon_enchantments.description: Bonus damage dice of chosen type.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Mark of the Protector
major_weapon_enchantments.description: Mark target on hit. They have disadvantage to attack others.

major_weapon_enchantments.name: Speed
major_weapon_enchantments.description: Make one additional weapon attack as a bonus action.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Ability Enhancement
minor_object_enchantments.description: Gain a bonus to ability checks and saving throws equal to the enchantment tier value.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Commanders Enhancement
minor_object_enchantments.description: Use reaction to grant advantage on attack roll or saving throw to ally within 30 feet.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Defensive Enhancement
minor_object_enchantments.description: Bonus to AC equal to enchantment tier. Does not stack with Unarmored Defense.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Elemental Resistance
minor_object_enchantments.description: Gain resistance to a chosen damage type. Multiple instances allowed.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Elemental Focus
minor_object_enchantments.description: Spells you cast ignore resistance to chosen damage type. Multiple instances allowed.

minor_object_enchantments.name: False Detection
minor_object_enchantments.description: You are hidden from divination magic, can't be targeted or scryed by it.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Greater Healing
minor_object_enchantments.description: Add dice from tier to healing spells. Must be holding item during cast.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Greater Power Increase
minor_object_enchantments.description: Increase an ability score by 2, up to 22. Chosen at enchantment.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Power Increase
minor_object_enchantments.description: Increase an ability score by 2, up to 20. Chosen at enchantment.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Resilience
minor_object_enchantments.description: Gain proficiency in a saving throw of your choice. Multiple instances allowed.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Skill Empowerment
minor_object_enchantments.description: Advantage on ability checks using a specific skill/tool you're proficient in. Multiple instances allowed.

minor_object_enchantments.name: Spell Enhancement
minor_object_enchantments.description: Bonus to spell attacks and DC. Regain spell slot once per long rest. Acts as focus.

major_object_enchantments.name: Barrier
major_object_enchantments.description: Gain temporary HP for self or ally. Uses per day based on tier. Must hold object.

major_object_enchantments.name: Bind Spell
major_object_enchantments.description: Object can cast bound spells. Costs based on spell level and effects. Highly customizable.
major_object_enchantments.cost: Variable per spell level and effect (see spell table and modifiers)

major_object_enchantments.name: Creature Protection
major_object_enchantments.description: Disadvantage to attacks from chosen creature type. Immunity to charm, fright, and possession from them.

major_object_enchantments.name: Damage Resistance
major_object_enchantments.description: Resistance to chosen physical damage type.

major_object_enchantments.name: Elemental Immunity
major_object_enchantments.description: Immunity to chosen elemental damage type.

major_object_enchantments.name: Magical Mastery
major_object_enchantments.description: Cast spells of chosen school one level higher.

major_object_enchantments.name: Magical Mitigation
major_object_enchantments.description: Use reaction and spell slot to reduce damage taken.

major_object_enchantments.name: Magic Resistance
major_object_enchantments.description: Advantage on saving throws vs spells and magical effects.

major_object_enchantments.name: Missile Resistance
major_object_enchantments.description: Resistance to ranged weapon attacks and Dex save damage.

major_object_enchantments.name: Resource Recharge
major_object_enchantments.description: Class-based recharge ability, varies by class. Once per long rest.

major_object_enchantments.name: Restore
major_object_enchantments.description: Restore HP for self or ally. Uses per day based on tier. Must hold object.

major_object_enchantments.name: Regeneration
major_object_enchantments.description: Regain 1 HP each turn unless at 0 HP.

major_object_enchantments.name: Ruin
major_object_enchantments.description: Deal force damage to creature or heal undead. Uses per day based on tier. Must hold object.

major_object_enchantments.name: Summon Monster
major_object_enchantments.description: Summons creatures of a specified type (e.g., undead, fey, etc.) once per day. You choose tier (I-X) and CR breakdown. Summoned creatures act on your initiative and vanish if reduced to 0 HP, after 1 hour, or if you lose concentration. Must hold the object to activate. Includes options for consumable version (25% cost). Extensive customization.
